  • Research
  • multi-streamed F2FS (msF2FS): An NVMe ZNS SSD optimized F2FS File System with concurrently writable hot/warm/cold data streams and application-guided data placement.
  • zns-tools: A set of tools for understanding/tracing ZNS devices.
  • TropoDB: Append-only LSM-tree KV-store made for ZNS devices.
